ja258:0.1_0: The group of twelve on “as expected”
ja258:1.1_0: A galaxy extends a thousand times as far
ja258:1.2_0: as the moon and sun revolve
ja258:1.4_0: whose creatures is slaughtered the earth.
ja258:2.1_0: Even if it were raining money,
ja258:2.2_0: you’d not be sated in sensual pleasures.
ja258:2.3_0: An astute person understands that sensual pleasures
ja258:2.4_0: offer little gratification and much suffering.
ja258:3.3_0: A disciple of the fully awakened Buddha
ja258:4.1_0: The eighth elements of the mind.
